description:
Beat Craps by Controlling the Dice!

  • Proper betting to exploit your edge over the casinos
  • How to bet on random rollers and the proper bet spreading techniques
  • How to get more comps for less risk and the proper bankroll

Become the casinos' worst nightmare! Beat casino craps by using a controlled dice throw! This video will show you how to develop a Golden Touch at craps.

Frank Scoblete, gaming's #1 best-selling author, and Dominator, the world's greatest dice controller, along with Golden Touch dice control instructors, gaming columnist "Stickman," and best-selling author Bill Burton teach you the Golden Touch dice control method to beat the game of craps! Dominator was divine—a hint: he was so good that no one will believe what he did - except we had nine witnesses to it thankfully and also filmed it! You will see their shots from every angle. From start to finish. Also complete statistics of their throws.

The Golden Touch™ Dice Control Online Course is a superior, professional product in every way. It's loaded with visuals and insider information.

There are over 200 shots shown in the course from all angles - front, side, back, tabletop; plus landings, bounces, back-wall hits. There is also excellent slow motion footage too so you can actually see how the dice hit the back wall and land. Some shots go right into the camera from head on. Wow!

We did not edit any shots - you'll see an actual practice session with dozens of shots. Plus all the shots throughout the rest of this online course. This is a professional, high quality video course—not a homemade one.

The visuals are remarkable. This online course can be used over and over when you are concerned that your form or throw is somewhat off.

Spend around two hours with the pros!
title: Win at Craps with Golden Touch
